refactorings_applied: DRY: Extract getErrorMessage() utility for centralized error handling
Replace duplicate error extraction patterns in start.ts, stop.ts, status.ts
Add comprehensive tests for security warnings in daemon.ts
Add tests for status display details (port, URL)
Add tests for error handling in start/stop commands
Add tests for getErrorMessage utility function
Add tests for validateConfig edge cases
commits: 9a621dc: refactor(cli): improve code quality and test coverage
principles_applied: SOLID/SRP - Error handling logic separated into dedicated function
KISS - Simple error message extraction implementation
notes: CLI utils coverage improved from 77.17% to 79.09%
CLI commands coverage improved from 67.55% to 72.88%
Target coverage of 80% not fully reached due to foreground mode tests being skipped (require integration tests)
No new ESLint or TypeScript errors introduced
message: Refactoring completed. Code quality improved through DRY principle application and comprehensive test coverage additions. CLI module coverage improved significantly.
